name: Restoration Ministries
description: Spirit-led, non-denominational church providing food assistance through their Sack Lunch Ministry and daily hot meal program. They feed the hungry in their community and offer various community outreach programs including Grace & Grease (auto services for single moms/widows), Threads of Grace (crocheting for those in need), and other support services.
source: Verified from official website and cross-referenced with multiple sources
eligibility_requirements: Open to all community members in need
populations_served: Community members, families, single moms, widows, disabled individuals
